data.title: William Davis, Sr. Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Willaim C. Davis, Sr., beloved husband of  66 years to Gola Jean Davis, devoted father of William C. Davis,Jr. "Buddy" and his wife Marlene "Vicky", Gola Lynn Wanken and her hus...
data.text:
Willaim C. Davis, Sr., beloved husband of 66 years to Gola Jean Davis, devoted father of William C. Davis,Jr. "Buddy" and his wife Marlene "Vicky", Gola Lynn Wanken and her husband Charles, and the late James Mervin Davis, dear brother of Mary Franklin and the late Robert Davis and Gloria Wood, dear father-n-law of Alison Davis, loving grandfather of Matthew Joseph Davis, Brandon Christopher Wanken and the late James William Davis, loving great-grandfather of Hailey Louise Davis.

Bill was born in Maryland on April 6, 1934, to his parents Robert and Mary Davis and passed away in the Baltimore-Washington Medical Center on January 31, 2023.

Relatives and friends are invited to call at the family owned and operated MCCULLY POLYNIAK & COLLINS FUNERAL HOME 3204 Mountain Road PASADENA on Saturday 3 to 4:30 pm ONLY. Where funeral services will be held on Saturday at 4:30 pm. Cremation services to follow.
